description:
This episode of Meisaku is inspired by "fitness games." Lassi-sensei wants to lose some weight, so Meisaku and others invite him to the world of a popular fitness game. Kensho Ono voices Instruc-dog.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fitness Game Where Even Dogs Can Lose Weight!
犬でもヤセる! フィットネス
